title: High-Speed Bunny-Hop in Tour de France Sprint Saves Mads Pedersen from Severe Injury
content:
Alex Zingle's fast-twitch muscle reaction saved Pedersen — and himself — from perhaps more serious injury: 'I was coming too fast to brake.'

Read the full article at High-Speed Bunny-Hop in Tour de France Sprint Saves Mads Pedersen from Severe Injury on Velo.
author: ahood
